column1: 3,1610048553,3,6,The focus rectangle is supposed to help the user observe that the click was effective and thereby prevent him from accidentally clicking twice. so are you sure you are solving a problem and not creating one?,

column2: we can remove that border in chrome

column1: 5,1610048736,2,8,"You can seal individual methods to prevent them from being overridable:
6,1610048754,1,8,Yes. if you mark a method as sealed then it can not be overriden in a derived class.,

7,1610048778,0,8,"Any explanation why is this better? sealed has a rather clean meaning. it says ""after some thinking i came to the conclusion that this should never be overridden",eeb4c60a-f526-4f85-9532-4e9bac42f2fdScreenshot_from_2020-12-21_15-10-47.png
